plot: Cyrano (Edgar Ramírez), Roxana (Jessika Grau) and Cristian (PastorOviedo) star in a love triangle that develops in one of the most impressive urban scenarios of the world: the labyrinthine paths and stairs of a Venezuelan neighborhood. Cyrano is also a social hero; It is a character that defends the ethics and the popular dignity at all costs, again crashing against the reality of every day. The story of Cyrano Fernández is somehow all men, any of us, i.e., the chasm between what we really are and what we dream to be.
title: Cyrano Fernández
